Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Bombinin-like peptide 1 (Contains: Bombinin H; toads, amphibians, animals)
Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.1712299]Gram-positive bacteria:Staphylococcus species;Gram-negative bacteria:Escherichia coli, Klebsiella pneumoniae, Enterobacter cloacae, Pseudomonas aeruginosa, Pseudomonas maltophilia, Alcaligenes denitrificans.
Sequence Information.Function: Has antimicrobial activity, but low hemolytic activity. Preliminary evidence indicates that this peptide does not lyse and thus kill the bacteria by its antimicrobial activity. Bombinin H has antibacterial and hemolytic activity.

Literature.Title: A family of bombinin-related peptides from the skin of Bombina variegata.
Literature.Author: Simmaco M, Barra D, Chiarini F, Noviello L, Melchiorri P, Kreil G, Richter K.

Literature.Title: Antibacterial and haemolytic peptides containing D-alloisoleucine from the skin of Bombina variegata.
Literature.Author: Mignogna G, Simmaco M, Kreil G, Barra D.
